results.name: n minus the number of its prime-factors: a(n) = n - A001222(n).
comment: Prime factors are counted with multiplicity. [_Harvey P. Dale_, Sep 20 2011]
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..5000
